channel.title: Electromagnetic Sensing on FEEC/UNICAMP IA382 - Seminar in Computer Engineering
channel.description: Recent content in Electromagnetic Sensing on FEEC/UNICAMP IA382 - Seminar in Computer Engineering

item.title: Sensing Without Seeing: EM Approaches to High-resolution Non-contact Detection
item.description: Abstract # Electromagnetic (EM) sensing is rapidly emerging as a compelling alternative to traditional visual and optical methods in real-time detection, offering advantages in sensitivity, selectivity, and resilience in harsh environments or complex sensing medium.
